src:
Zabil se je vanj in odpeljal
Povzročitelj nesreče je brez vozniškega dovoljenja.
04 Nov 2019, 20:20 by T. V.
ŠARED – V petek, 1. novembra, ob 23.25 je na cesti Šared–Korte v vozilo moškega, ki je nesrečo prijavil, trčil voznik osebnega avtomobila, zatem pa odpeljal. Prijavitelj nesreče je zapeljal za njim. Povzročitelj se je ustavil v Kortah, nato pa ponovno odpeljal.Policisti so ustavili 43-letnega domačina, ki nima vozniškega dovoljenja. Odredili so mu preizkus alkoholiziranosti, ta pa je pokazal 1,12 miligrama alkohola na liter izdihanega zraka (približno 2,35 promila). Vozilo so zasegli, sledi pa še obdolžilni predlog.
text:
He got into it and drove off
The driver of the accident is without a driver's license.
04 Nov 2019, 20:20 by T.V.
ŠARED - A car driver collided on the Šared-Korte road on Friday, November 1st at 11:25 pm in the vehicle of the man who reported the accident, and then drove away. The whistleblower drove behind him. The gunman stopped in Korte, then drove off again. Police officers stopped a 43-year-old resident who did not have a driver's license. He was given an alcohol test, which showed 1.12 milligrams of alcohol per liter of exhaled air (approximately 2.35 ppm). The vehicle was seized, followed by an indictment.
